definition: "Schon" is an adverb that is commonly used to express various meanings related to time, emphasizing that something has already happened or occurred earlier than expected. It can also convey a sense of completion or readiness. Additionally, "schon" can be used to indicate surprise or disbelief, similar to the English word "really."

examples.english: He has been married for a long time.
I have had enough of it already.
